chapters.title: Chapter 1: Leaving the Prophet
chapters.info: The Empress (of Seanchan), p. 88—Supreme ruler of Seanchan. She is considered to be a direct descendant of the first emperor of Seanchan, Luthair Paendrag Mondwhin. She presides over the Court of the Nine Moons on the Seanchan continent. She is Tuon's mother. See also Algwyn; Daughter of the Nine Moons; Meldarath, Suroth Sabelle; Paendrag, Tuon Athaem Kore.
